title: How to Remove Mold from Children's Bath Toys

steps.headline: Mix vinegar and water in a plastic bucket.
Add toys.
steps.description: If they are not covered, add more vinegar and warm water.

steps.headline: Weight down floating toys if possible.
After toys have soaked, scrub with a bristle cleaning brush.
If the vinegar soak does not remove all the mold, use another step.
Put the toys in another bucket, and cover with warm water.

text: Mix vinegar and water in a plastic bucket.  Add toys. If they are not covered, add more vinegar and warm water. Weight down floating toys if possible.  Soak toys overnight.  After toys have soaked, scrub with a bristle cleaning brush.  Rinse thoroughly with clean water.  If the vinegar soak does not remove all the mold, use another step.  Put the toys in another bucket, and cover with warm water.  Add denture tablets. Allow to soak overnight.
